name: ✨Funcy Midnight Drift✨
description:
Experience effortless style with the Funcy Midnight Drift oversized t-shirt. Crafted from premium, breathable fabric, this deep navy tee offers a relaxed fit for all-day comfort.

✅ Ultra-soft & lightweight
✅ Timeless oversized silhouette
✅ Versatile & easy to style
✅ Unisex design

📏 Sizes: S, M, L, XL, XXL
🛒 Limited stock – shop now!
shipping: Free standard shipping on all orders.
Express shipping available for an additional fee.
